Build Identifier: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; rv:2.0b10pre) Gecko/20110117 Firefox/4.0b10pre

When setting a bordercolor attribute for a table element, the default borderstyle is "outset". In Firefox <= 3.6.x it used to be solid. Chrome, Safari and IE show a solid border as well. 
However when defining the border-color CSS style, the default is "outset" for all browser.

Is this change intended? Should the bordercolor attribute only affect the bordercolor or the borderstyle as well as in previous versions?

See bug 573960 as well for screenshots and initial report.

Reproducible: Always
